project_description: A simple Flutter application that shows a text of a pet (Cat/Dog) with an icon. When the text is clicked, it toggles between Cat and Dog.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with a separation of concerns. The Cubit pattern is used for state management, ensuring a clean and maintainable code base.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. Sets up the app and provides the necessary Cubits.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Contains the HomeScreen widget which is the main screen of the app.

files.name: lib/widgets/pet_text_widget.dart
files.description: Defines the PetTextWidget which displays the pet text and icon.

files.name: lib/cubits/pet_cubit.dart
files.description: Contains the PetCubit which manages the state of the pet.

methods.name: togglePet
methods.description: Toggles the pet state between Cat and Dog.

files.name: lib/models/pet_model.dart
files.description: Defines the Pet model which represents the state of the pet (Cat or Dog).

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Main screen of the app displaying the PetTextWidget.

widgets.name: PetTextWidget
widgets.description: Displays the pet text and icon. Toggles the pet state when clicked.

cubits.name: PetCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the pet (Cat or Dog) and provides methods to toggle the state.

methods.name: togglePet
methods.description: Toggles the pet state between Cat and Dog.

models.name: Pet
models.description: Represents the state of the pet, either Cat or Dog.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: onTap PetTextWidget
HomeScreen -> PetCubit: togglePet()
PetCubit -> Pet: update state
Pet -> PetCubit: new state
PetCubit -> HomeScreen: emit new state
HomeScreen -> PetTextWidget: rebuild with new state
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state of the pet is managed by the PetCubit. When the user taps on the PetTextWidget, the togglePet method of the PetCubit is called, which toggles the state between Cat and Dog. The new state is then emitted, causing the HomeScreen to rebuild with the new state.
navigation_flow: The app consists of a single screen (HomeScreen) which contains the PetTextWidget. There is no navigation to other screens in this simple app.
